name: The delivery truck
description:
Deliver a maximum number of packages while crushing a minimum number of people !

Controls

S - Start
Left/Right - Left/Right
Space - Drop a package

Rules

You have 20 packages to deliver
Each package delivered in front of a house gives +100 points
Each person crushed gives -50 points

> 1000 is a nice score
2000 is  a perfect score

Context

Made in exactly 3 hours and 0 minutes
Made for Bean Jam #7 (theme: You are an unstoppable death machine)
Made for Trijam #107: (theme: Package delivery)
Made by Léon
